verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: The <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> that <S%H6437>looketh<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east<s%> shall be <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H4639>working<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; but on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> day it shall be <S%H6605>opened<s%>, and on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the new <S%H2320>moon<s%> it shall be <S%H6605>opened<s%>.

And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%>, and shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> by the <S%H4201>post<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>; and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> his <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> and his <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%>, and he shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> at the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>: then he shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%>; but the <S%H8179>gate<s%> shall not be <S%H5462>shut<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of that <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> and on the new <S%H2320>moons<s%>.

And the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> that the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall be on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>;

and the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> shall be an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for the <S%H352>ram<s%>, and the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> for the <S%H3532>lambs<s%> as he is <S%H3027>able<s%> to <S%H4991>give<s%>, and a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> to an <S%H374>ephah<s%>.

And on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the new <S%H2320>moon<s%> it shall be a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>, and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%>, and a <S%H352>ram<s%>; they shall be without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>:

and he shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for the <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for the <S%H352>ram<s%>, and for the <S%H3532>lambs<s%> according as <S%H3027>he<s%> is <S%H5381>able<s%>, and a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> to an <S%H374>ephah<s%>.

And when the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%>, he shall <S%H935>go<s%> in by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and he shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> by the way <S%H1870>thereof<s%>.

But when the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in the appointed <S%H4150>feasts<s%>, he that <S%H935>entereth<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>; and he that <S%H935>entereth<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>: he shall not <S%H7725>return<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> whereby he came <S%H935>in<s%>, but shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> straight before <S%H5226>him<s%>.
And the <S%H5387>prince<s%>, when they go <S%H935>in<s%>, shall go <S%H935>in<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3318>them<s%>; and when they go forth, they shall go forth <S%H3318>together<s%>.

And in the <S%H2282>feasts<s%> and in the <S%H4150>solemnities<s%> the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> shall be an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for a <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for a <S%H352>ram<s%>, and for the <S%H3532>lambs<s%> as he is <S%H3027>able<s%> to <S%H4991>give<s%>, and a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> to an <S%H374>ephah<s%>.

And when the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> <S%H5071>a<s%> <S%H5930>freewill-offering<s%>, a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> or <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%> as a <S%H5071>freewill-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, one shall <S%H6605>open<s%> for him the <S%H8179>gate<s%> that <S%H6437>looketh<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east<s%>; and he shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> his <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> and his <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%>, as he doth on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: then he shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%>; and <S%H310>after<s%> his going <S%H3318>forth<s%> one shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%>: <S%H1242>morning<s%> by <S%H1242>morning<s%> shalt thou prepare <S%H6213>it<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> with it <S%H1242>morning<s%> by <S%H1242>morning<s%>, the sixth <S%H8345>part<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah<s%>, and the third <S%H7992>part<s%> of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>, to moisten the fine <S%H5560>flour<s%>; a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> by a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>ordinance<s%>.

Thus shall they <S%H6213>prepare<s%> the <S%H3532>lamb<s%>, and the <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, and the <S%H8081>oil<s%>, morning by <S%H1242>morning<s%>, for a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: If the <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> a <S%H4979>gift<s%> unto <S%H376>any<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, it is his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, it shall belong to his <S%H1121>sons<s%>; it is their <S%H272>possession<s%> by <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

But if he <S%H5414>give<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> a <S%H4979>gift<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, it shall be his to the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1865>liberty<s%>; then it shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H5387>prince<s%>; but as for his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, it shall be for his <S%H1121>sons<s%>.

Moreover the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>'s <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, <S%H3238>to<s%> <S%H3238>thrust<s%> them out of their <S%H272>possession<s%>; he shall give <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> out of his own <S%H272>possession<s%>, that my <S%H5971>people<s%> be not <S%H6327>scattered<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H272>possession<s%>.

Then he <S%H935>brought<s%> me through the <S%H3996>entry<s%>, which was at the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, into the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, which <S%H6437>looked<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north<s%>: <S%H4725>and<s%>, behold, there was a place on the hinder <S%H3411>part<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4725>me<s%>, This is the place where the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H1310>boil<s%> the <S%H2403>trespass-offering<s%> and the <S%H817>sin-offering<s%>, and where they shall <S%H644>bake<s%> the <S%H2403>meal-offering<s%>; that they <S%H3318>bring<s%> them not forth into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Then he brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%>, and caused me to pass <S%H5674>by<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4740>corners<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%>; <S%H4740>and<s%>, behold, in every <S%H4740>corner<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> there was a <S%H2691>court<s%>.

In the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4740>corners<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> there were <S%H2691>courts<s%> <S%H7000>inclosed<s%>, <S%H705>forty<s%> cubits <S%H753>long<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%>: these <S%H702>four<s%> in the <S%H7106>corners<s%> were of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure<s%>.

And there was a <S%H2905>wall<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> in <S%H5439>them<s%>, round about the <S%H702>four<s%>, and <S%H4018>boiling-places<s%> were <S%H6213>made<s%> under the <S%H2918>walls<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto <S%H1310>me<s%>, These are the boiling - <S%H1004>houses<s%>, where the <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H1310>boil<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
